mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.member_nick FROM QNA a INNER JOIN MEMBER b ON a.member_no = b.member_no ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT a.qna_no, a.c_no, a.member_no, a.qna_title,a.qna_content, a.qna_when, a.DEPTH, a.qna_state, a.super_no, a.group_no FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, q.* FROM qna q ORDER BY qna_no ASC) a WHERE rn BETWEEN ${start} AND ${finish};
SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE C_NO = #{c_no} AND QNA_NO =#{qna_no}
